title: President Donald J. Trump Is Safeguarding Americans’ Mental Health and Preventing The Tragedy of Suicide – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
October 5, 2020
At a time when many Americans are experiencing increased stress, anxiety, and personal loss, we must also ensure that our country can meet the mental health needs of those struggling in this crisis.
						President Donald J. Trump					IMPROVING MENTAL HEALTH: President Donald J. Trump is taking action to improve Americans’ mental health which has been harmed by prolonged lockdowns.
